channel.title: Need step-by-stepon how to create commans
channel.description: tell me how and where to put commands i alredy have a command maker i just need o know whhere to put them

item.title: Need step-by-stepon how to create commans
item.dc:creator: @formel117 formel117
item.description:
@formel117 wrote:

[quote=“XmoparscapeX, post:3, topic:65378”][quote author=messing with java link=topic=95039.msg983113#msg983113 date=1173317051]
search for commands in client.java until you see things like

if (command.startsWith(“barrows”) && playerRights >=3)
{
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);
addItem(4721, 1000);
addItem(4723, 1000);
addItem(4709, 1000);
addItem(4711, 1000);
addItem(4713, 1000);
addItem(4715, 1000);
addItem(4754, 1000);
addItem(4756, 1000);
addItem(4758, 1000);
addItem(4760, 1000);
addItem(4746, 1000);
addItem(4748, 1000);
addItem(4750, 1000);
addItem(4752, 1000);
addItem(4733, 1000);
addItem(4735, 1000);
addItem(4737, 1000);
addItem(4739, 1000);
addItem(4727, 1000);
addItem(4729, 1000);
addItem(4731, 1000);
addItem(4725, 1000);
}

you place it in with these codes

[/quote] yes i kno but how do u change it so u dont type ::barrows like ::pwnage ?? or sumic[/quote]

if you see " if (command.startsWith(“barrows”) && playerRights >=3)"
change the (“barrows”) to (“whateveruwant”), and its done.

Read full topic
item.source: Need step-by-stepon how to create commans
